title: China-Japan crisis deepens amid bomber flights and canceled concerts

title: Franco-German children of war's endless search for their roots
subhead: In France, between 1941 and 1945, around 200,000 children are estimated to have been born from a union between a French woman and a German soldier. Their often painful search for their origins meets many obstacles, including family taboos and difficult access to archives.
